segments.text: How can I help you today , Alice ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I came to talk to you because I want to apply for a scholarship .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , good . You're an excellent student . I'd be very willing to help you with that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . I really appreciate it.In fact , I do need a letter of recommendation for this scholarship .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of scholarship is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's an undergraduate scholarship offered by the American Minority Students Scholarship Association . I'm eligible for it because I'm Asian American .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine . I know about that scholarship.You have to be a student in your junior year , and you have to have a grade point average of 3.7 or higher .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm a junior now , and my GPA is 3.92 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excellent . So you'll have a good chance of getting it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I hope so . The competition is probably pretty heavy.And they want a writing sample too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have an essay you want to send them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , they want a special essay . I must write an essay on a particular question they pose .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is the question ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They give applicants a topic.The topic is , The Place of Ethnic Minorities in a Democratic Society.My essay must be three pages typed and double-spaced .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a pretty short essay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but I need to write it by next week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good luck . I'm sure you will do a good job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I came here today to talk to you because ... Well , I need to ask two favors .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . What are they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First , I need a letter of recommendation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd be happy to write one for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And second ... Well , I'm not sure if it's normal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is it ? Do you want me to read your essay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , if you could . I mean , if you could read it to make sure there are no mistakes.Or maybe you'd have some suggestions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course I could read it . That's no problem . But you need to get it to me soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will . I want to write the first draft tonight.So I could bring it tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . If you can bring it to me tomorrow morning , I can talk with you after class on Friday.So I'll have some feedback for you before the weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would really help me a lot . I'm very grateful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't mention it . I'm always willing to help good students .
segments.speaker: S1
